CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Finally , to further improve the PCE of P3 : PC71BM , methanol was spin - coated on the top of the active layer before electrode deposition.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency
2. P3: A specific type of photovoltaic cell or solar cell
3. PC71BM: A specific type of material, likely a polymer used as the active layer in the photovoltaic cell.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "PC71BM" and "methanol".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
The Material Name entities in the paragraph are: "PC71BM" and "methanol".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Finally , to further improve the PCE of P3 : PC71BM , methanol was spin - coated on the top of the active layer before electrode deposition.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency
2. P3: A specific photovoltaic cell or solar cell with the model number "P3"
3. PC71BM: A specific active layer material used in the photovoltaic cell "P3"
4. Methanol: A chemical substance used for spin-coating on the active layer of the photovoltaic cell "P3" before electrode deposition.

So, the property values in the paragraph are:

1. PCE =  Improved value after methanol treatment
2. PCE of P3 = Initial power conversion efficiency of the photovoltaic cell P3
3. PC71BM = Initial active layer material of the photovoltaic cell P3
4. Methanol = Chemical substance used for improving the PCE of P3.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency
2. Initial PCE of P3: Initial power conversion efficiency of the photovoltaic cell P3
3. Improved PCE: Power conversion efficiency after methanol treatment

So, the relevant property values in the paragraph are:

1. Initial PCE of P3: A numerical value representing the initial power conversion efficiency of the photovoltaic cell P3.
2. Improved PCE: A numerical value representing the power conversion efficiency of the photovoltaic cell P3 after methanol treatment.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Initial PCE of P3 |
| Improved PCE |

| Property Description |
| --- |
| Power Conversion Efficiency of the photovoltaic cell P3 before methanol treatment |
| Power Conversion Efficiency of the photovoltaic cell P3 after methanol treatment |
